title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build production-grade middleware with Bedrock Agentcore and MCP (AIM204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Bedrock Agentcore 和 MCP 构建生产级中间件 (AIM204)
abstract: The AWS ecosystem around AI has evolved from foundation model invocation on Bedrock to full-services agentic runtime complete with tools, memory, and more with Bedrock Agentcore. Based off architectural experience across enterprises and software companies, Cybage will focus on the realities of production-grade middleware with Agentcore and MCP. We will cover dilemmas of balancing speed with production-readiness and tradeoffs between open-ended chat and opiniated agents. Also-the challenges and resolutions of infusing AI into existing software deployed on AWS with a focus on MCP, Evaluation, Security, and Governance. Leave with learnings to apply to your AI journey on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Cybage Software, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: AWS围绕AI的生态系统已从Bedrock上的基础模型调用演变为完整的代理运行时服务，Bedrock Agentcore配备了工具、内存等功能。基于跨企业和软件公司的架构经验，Cybage将重点关注使用Agentcore和MCP构建生产级中间件的实际情况。我们将探讨在速度与生产就绪性之间取得平衡的困境，以及开放式聊天与固定意见代理之间的权衡。此外，还将讨论将AI注入部署在AWS上的现有软件时面临的挑战和解决方案，重点关注MCP、评估、安全性和治理。带走可应用于您在AWS上的AI之旅的经验教训。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cybage Software提供。

presenter.name: Aneesh Nathani
presenter.title: Vice President, Cloud, Data, and AI Practice
